# database

mcp database tool


## Terraform

Create a `terraform.tfvars` files and set the following variables:

```hcl
name       = "database-tool"
gateway_id = "myagent-gateway-xqioi5co1n"
```


## Development
```
 Choose a make command to run

  init      initialize a new python project
  install:  add a new package (make install <package>), or install all project dependencies from piplock.txt (make install)
  start     run local project
```
